thread.title: Charlotte Irmgard Hunt
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Charlotte Irmgard Hunt

author: Charlotte Irmgard Hunt
title: Charlotte Irmgard Hunt
text: The itinerary prepared was accurate with clear instructions as when to be present for pickups and activities. The activities included and the locations of the hotels proved to be quite convenient and were top notch hotels. The Coral Expedition cruise was exceptionally exciting and fun.
